column1: Robbah is a district in El Oued Province
column4: 719.Robbah District is situated 10 kilometres (6.2 mi) south of the capital of the wilaya
column5: El Oued. Robbah is a major town in the district. It is surrounded by some small villages such as El Khobna
column7: El Aquila and El Ogla. These villages are widely known for agriculture and animal breeding. Most people in this district are Arabs
